name: GentleForge Academy Part 1
description:
Incorporated a lot of art from Itch.io assets page, and credited them with the game itself.

Play the first arc of a new thrilling visual novel style game. Play as a version of yourself where you attend the prestigious Gentleforge Academy, home of some of the best Mythics in the city. But wait there seems to be something troubling occurring, play through to find out more.

Will be updating this fully when I get the chance.
